long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides basic AutoCorrect as you type in anywhere on any website. More than 4500+ common typos, plus provision to add your own substitution in the settings page.

FEATURES:
 - Works on all Website and Text Boxes
 - Create shortcuts for Addresses, Email IDs, Signatures
 - Fill forms easily by predefining shortcuts
 - Data Entry at a much faster rate in Chrome 
 - Never make typing mistakes in chats or Emails
 - Autocorrects SMS and Internet lingo
 - Over 4500+ common typos in-built
 - Disable extension easily on desired websites
 - Easily export/import your typo list
 - Never Google correct spellings again! We know you do that!
----------------------------------------------------------
